similarities: Uses standard GR and QFT as foundation
Incorporates information-theoretic concepts like Amari's work
Explores modified gravity like scalar-tensor theories
differences: Uses a scalar field for both dark matter and dark energy (unified dark sector)
Focus on statistical manifold as fundamental (distinct from string theory's strings or LQG's loops)
Attempts to unify dark matter and modified gravity approaches
known_challenges: Must recover GR in solar system scale with high precision
Must be consistent with binary pulsar tests
Must not violate energy conditions or causality
